name: American Express Company
summary: American Express Company (Amex) is a leading American multinational financial services corporation specializing in payment cards and banking services. Founded in 1850 and headquartered in New York City, Amex is one of the world's largest card networks, serving millions of consumer and business customers globally. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker AXP and is ranked among the top 100 on the Fortune 500.
